long_description: The Astral Abba PFD is made with partially organic materials and tailored for women paddlers looking for comfort and style. Organically grown, hand-harvested kapok material is sealed in a lightweight, radio-frequency-welded pillow for durable and gently conforming flotation. Designed for a smooth feel, the Astral Abba PFD includes stretchy side panels and soft, fold-resistant neoprene shoulder straps. Feminine shaping offers a great fit and appearance; low-cut neckline and narrow chest lines help reduce chafing. Polyethylene foam in the back panel offers impact protection and light weight. Fleece-lined, zippered handwarmer pockets offer respite from chilly winds; large zippered chest pocket secures small items and features a key loop. Lightweight and tough nylon shell resists abrasion; lash tab offers a handy point of attachment for accessories. Reflective highlights increase visibility.
short_description: The Astral Abba PFD is made with partially organic materials and tailored for women paddlers looking for comfort and style.
